SELECT a.authority_id authorityId, c.authority_name authorityName, c.authority_url authorityUrl, c.oper_type operType FROM qft_position_authority a LEFT JOIN qft_company_authority b ON a.authority_id = b.id LEFT JOIN qft_menu_authority_base c ON b.authority_base_id = c.id where a.position_id = #{positionId} and c.is_delete = 0
